title: Fix SKLottieView animation not starting in CarouselView
body:
SKLottieView animations fail to start when initially visible in CarouselView. The animation timer checks `Window != null` but stops immediately because Window is null during initial layout. The Loaded event doesn't re-fire when Window is later assigned.

## Changes

- **Override `OnPropertyChanged` in `SKAnimatedSurfaceView`**: Monitor Window property and call `UpdateIsAnimationEnabled()` when Window transitions from null to non-null, restarting the animation timer
- **Add test `AnimationStartsWhenWindowBecomesAvailable`**: Verify animation starts after Window assignment using polling to avoid timing flakiness

## Impact

Fixes animations in any scenario where views are created before Window assignment (CarouselView, virtualized containers, lazy-loaded views).

```csharp
protected override void OnPropertyChanged(string? propertyName = null)
{
    base.OnPropertyChanged(propertyName);

    if (propertyName == nameof(Window))
    {
        if (Window is not null)
            UpdateIsAnimationEnabled();
    }
}
```

> [!WARNING]
